meanings.definition: A device used to maintain the shape of a shoe when it is not being worn.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new shoetree to keep my shoes in good shape.
meanings.sent2: The shoetree helped my shoes keep their form when I wasn't wearing them.
meanings.sent3: The shoetree looked like a tiny tree for shoes, it was cute.
meanings.sent4: The shoetree stood tall in the shoe, like a guardian protecting its shape.
meanings.sent5: The shoetree was like a mold, shaping the shoe perfectly.

meanings.definition: To insert a shoetree into a shoe to help maintain its shape.
meanings.sent1: I always shoetree my shoes after wearing them to keep them looking good.
meanings.sent2: Remember to shoetree your shoes to prevent them from getting squished.
meanings.sent3: He shoetreed his shoes with a flourish, like a magician performing a trick.
meanings.sent4: She shoetreed her shoes carefully, as if she was tending to a delicate plant.
meanings.sent5: Shoetreeing the shoes felt like giving them a hug to keep them in shape.
